name: ABC
text:
"If you're going to be in a situation where beyond your control there's a lot of people around you, make sure you wear a mask."

As Pres. Trump gears up for his upcoming campaign rally, Dr. Anthony Fauci urges people take precautions in large groups. https://t.co/AHoxei0qyJ https://t.co/BDErkboFy6

name: ABC
text:
RT @ABCNewsLive: Dr. Todd Ellerin on COVID-19 infections in several states: "We're seeing more cases, more hospitalizations, more deaths...We need to do better." https://t.co/nmT9k3ytun

"Rally at your own risk," he adds, when asked about Pres. Trump's upcoming rally. https://t.co/7M49EiZyTi

name: ABC
text: Amid protests and unrest over the killing of George Floyd, debate has continued over monuments to Confederate officers, as well as buildings and other landmarks named after them. https://t.co/k8HDfxRnwa https://t.co/zCCpVnPJ1v

name: ABC
text: More than two months after television and film productions screeched to a halt amid the COVID-19 pandemic, Hollywood is officially open again. https://t.co/Bc2dOuoP2x

name: ABC
text: Breonna Taylor's mom Tamika Palmer tells @JujuChangABC she's still seeking answers nearly three months after her daughter's death: "I haven't had time to sit and grieve… I'm still trying to figure out, why did it have to come to her being murdered." https://t.co/kXKfvIV8xR https://t.co/0fgupkQgBe

name: ABC
text: Advocates want to redirect police funding to community health, safety and economic programs, in an effort to develop new ways to address drug use, homelessness and other issues police are tasked with responding to in America. https://t.co/KhUBwJTiHT
